phrases: There is nothing like relaxing in your own home...
Maybe I should live here, too...
Lucy, you do not have any booze?
Among the members of her generation, she is been in Fairy Tail the longest.
Do you usually take baths together?
Do you usually stroll into other people's houses?
Did you and your dad patch things up after that?
Uh, I am not really sure...
I suppose you could say that.
Well, we have not exactly kept in touch.
If you are worried about something, I will lend an ear...
I am thinking of quitting the guild.
And that is what happened, Mira-san!
Cana did not even tell me why!
Cana always says that around this time.
Pretty soon it will be 6 months since I joined Fairy Tail.
I had no idea there was such a big event at the end of each year.
If you are going on a job, take me!
Sorry, but I will be going alone for now!
We will hang out with you when we get back!
Watch where you are running, you hothead!
And you are in my way, Fruit of the Gloom!
Do the two of you have time to be fighting?
There is no time for that!
You are going right back out?
I am going out on this job!
I am going on this one!
And I am on this one!
I totally had my eyes on that one first!
The one who takes the flier gets the job!
Team Shadow Gear's on their own during this time!
I also have the power to see the future.
Now that I consciously realize it, I am able to control it a little.
So tell me, who will I marry in the future?
I cannot see that far into the future.
Pretty soon Wakaba will come over and they will start talking about the young people in the guild.
It is that time of year again, you know?
We sure had that passion, you know?
But the young'uns these days are incredible!
Oh, more a breast man, are we?
I do not go'round starin' at girls' rears!
Man, could I take a bite out of...
Those could step on me any time!
I am sorry I went and predicted that...
Even so, that is amazing, Carla!
Anyway, I still cannot control it perfectly.
I can only stay in my original body for a short time, I see.
I suppose I should say as expected from Erza.
That is how awesome Lily is!
So this is the power of what they label S Class in this guild?
There are people who are working their butts off,
but there are people who are just doing the usual,
so I have no idea what exactly...
Almost all of the guild members have assembled here at Fairy Tail.
What is all the commotion about?
I heard that the Master has an important announcement!
Natsu, you cannot even keep still!
Finally, I will know the secret!
How about you just go home?
As we have done since days long past,
I will now announce the participants in this year's S Class Wizard Advancement Exam!
The Master is not finished speaking yet.
This year's exam will take place on Tenroujima!
It is holy ground for our guild.
So, what kind of test is it?
But it is always something extremely hard.
I mean, anyone who passes gets to be an S Class wizard, after all!
Each of your powers, hearts, and souls...
I have judged them all this past year...
Those who are Men, should become S Class!
There is always next year, right?
This is going to be good.
So everyone was trying their best so they would get chosen.
Could this be the reason she wants to quit the guild?
This time, only one of you will pass.
The exam will take place in a week,
so each of you, prepare yourselves!
Natsu and Gray are there, too!
I have heard about your reputation in the guild.
Does not seem like you are trusted.
I mean, I cannot tell you why, but I am not!
I want to explain but I cannot!
Such a fuss all the time.
What was that, just for a moment...
An unexpected something would be joining in for this event...
As this is the first time for some of you, let me explain the rules.
Each of the eight selected participants, please select a partner within the week of preparation.
It is a contest between two-person teams.
This exam tests your bonds with your friends.
There are two rules for the partners you can choose.
One: They must be a member of Fairy Tail.
You cannot partner with S Class wizards.
In other words, you cannot form a team with Erza, Mirajane, or Gildarts.
Being with Erza-san would make you far too powerful, after all.
The contents of the exam itself will be announced once you arrive at Tenroujima.
But this time, Erza will be blocking your progress.
I will also help out to get in your way!
You cannot become S Class without defeating Erza and Mira-san?!
Well, I am sure they will hold back a little, but...
Now you see what I meant by hard?
All S Class wizards have gone through the same path...
You are going to participate too, Gildarts?!
Do not be happy about that!
The eight selected participants and their chosen partners will assemble at Hargeon Port in one week.
This year's going to be tougher than ever.
I am surprised that it is the first time for all of you.
I am going to become S Class for sure!
The path to becoming S Class just got farther away for Elfman the Man!
Everyone seems to be having a rough time.
I am sure Laxus would be pleased if he comes back to see you have become an S Class wizard.
And the rank of the Raijinshuu will shoot up!
So Fried's partner is going to be Bickslow...
They seem like a powerful team, sure.
So then, has everyone decided on their partners?
I am partnering with Happy, of course.
If the exam is a race, then flying would make it a breeze!
Because if it comes down to fighting, you will be in trouble.
I am going to make Natsu an S Class wizard, for sure!
I am not holding back, even on my friends.
So in the two years I have been gone, Natsu's good enough to take the S Class exam, huh?
Natsu thinks that he will be able to meet Igneel if he becomes a great wizard.
He feels twice as strong about this exam as most people.
Um... Juvia would like to withdraw from this exam...
She says she wants to be your partner.
You are totally gunning for him, Lucy!
Are you planning on partnering with Lucy?!
Sorry, but I have already decided on my partner.
Sorry, but I will be lifting our contract during the period of the exam.
There is no need to worry.
I traveled through the gate with my own magic power.
So I will not use up your magic power.
Snow's falling, so it is got to be that!
Stop giant boulders with your body, and build up that defensive strength!
But are you technically a member of the guild, Loke?
I am still a Fairy Tail wizard.
With pride in my guild, I will make Gray an S Class wizard.
Were those two always so close?
You would better give me your best shot.
Let us have a passionate battle, just like old times!
I got along great with Edolas's Juvia.
And the Juvia over here is kind of cute!
Then what will I do for my partner?!
But you have been getting a passionate stare down for a while now...
Looks like she is pissed that Fried chose Bickslow as his partner.
More like one that turns you to stone...
Special Training Regimen 15: Increase your lower leg strength!
I will be heading to Tenroujima first.
I will be waiting for you, Natsu.
I will blow away Erza, and Mira, and Gildarts...
You might become an S class wizard.
So, you will be partnering with me, of course, right?
Do not be silly, she is partnering with me!
My magic is suited for battle!
Anyway, you just want to be together with Levy!
If you really want to be an S Class wizard, then I will lend you a hand.
I just have to blow away any guys who get in your way, right?
But I have got a small body, and I am not really good for anything...
Do not go sounding so weak before it is even started, man!
I am going to make you big time.
You have been quiet ever since this morning.
I have a bad feeling about this.
Do not participate, no matter what.
There is no one for me to partner with, so no worries.
I would not be so sure of that, Sky Maiden.
My chance has finally come around.
I am going to become S Class, no matter what.
That is no place to be dead drunk!
Man, what a lifesaver you are.
If no one had noticed me, I would have been a goner there.
You have been acting weird, Cana.
I am sure you heard from Mira.
I have got this complex about the S Class Exam, or something like that.
Does this have something to do with you saying you wanted to quit the guild?
This will be the fifth time.
I have failed the test 4 times...
I am a wizard who did not live up to expectations.
What does it matter how many times you fail?
I am the first ever to fail four times.
So, I am going to make this the last.
If I do not become S Class after this, I am leaving Fairy Tail.
You do not have to be so hung up over being S Class...
I have to become S Class!
If I do not become S Class this time...
I have made up my mind.
I will be your partner, Cana!
There is no way I will let you quit the guild!
Because I will make you an S Class wizard, Cana!
Then, one week later, at Hargeon Port...
Each with their own feelings in their chests, the day of the S Class Advancement Exam has come.
What is with the creepy face?
Actually, I am not that intere-
You see, my horoscope said that today I have the best luck in love!
So if I show everyone how awesome I am during the exam, then Carla will...
Next time: Who is the One with the Good Luck?
For your information, Carla is not participating in the exam.
